member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Data.AbpCommonDbProperties.DbTablePrefix
member.summary:
This table prefix is shared by most of the ABP modules. You can change it to set table prefix for all modules using this.
Default value: "Abp".

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Data.AbpDatabaseInfo.MappedConnections
member.summary: List of connection names mapped to this database.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Data.AbpDatabaseInfo.IsUsedByTenants
member.summary:
Is this database used by tenants. Set this to false if this database can not owned by tenants.
Default: true.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Data.AbpDatabaseInfoDictionary.RefreshIndexes
member.summary: This method should be called if this dictionary changes. It refreshes indexes for quick access to the connection informations.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Data.DataSeedContext.Item(System.String)
member.returns: Returns the value in the dictionary by given . Returns null if given is not present in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Data.DataSeedContext.Properties
member.summary: Can be used to get/set custom properties.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Data.DataSeedContext.WithProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a property in the dictionary. This is a shortcut for nested calls on this object.

member.name: T:Volo.Abp.ISoftDelete
member.summary: Used to standardize soft deleting entities. Soft-delete entities are not actually deleted, marked as IsDeleted = true in the database, but can not be retrieved to the application normally.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.ISoftDelete.IsDeleted
member.summary: Used to mark an Entity as 'Deleted'.
